duties_responsibilities.duty: Develop and deploy credit risk models to production environments.
Lead the effectiveness of predictive modeling and minimize credit losses for our products.
Engage with Engineers, Data Architects, and DevOps colleagues to ship models with step-change improvements in AUC/ROC/KS.
Analyze market trends, customer behavior, and competitor activity to identify growth opportunities and refine strategies.

education_certification.credential: Master's degree or Ph.D. in Computer Science, Mathematics, or EE/ECE from a top-tier institution.
